{}.response: The 'Get Statuses' API function within this advanced open-source online code execution system is used to retrieve the current status of the systems and services. It provides an overview of operational aspects such as system health, service availability, version information, and any scheduled maintenance or ongoing incidents. This information is crucial for users to understand the real-time state of the code execution environment, ensuring they can manage their development and execution activities accordingly. The output typically includes statuses such as 'Operational', 'Maintenance', 'Degraded Performance', 'Partial Outage', or 'Major Outage' for different components of the system, such as the execution engine, API endpoints, user interface, and data storage services.
